show.title: mundhanai muduchi
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/mAf5S9
show.description: When Varun decides to divorce his wife Kripa to be with another woman, she surprises him by agreeing—on the condition that he finds her a new partner first. As Varun sets out to fulfill her request, he is forced to confront his true feelings, sparking a journey of humor, love, and unexpected realizations.
show.description_secondary: When Varun decides to divorce his wife Kripa to be with another woman, she surprises him by agreeing—on the condition that he finds her a new partner first. As Varun sets out to fulfill her request, he is forced to confront his true feelings, sparking a journey of humor, love, and unexpected realizations.
